ModMetaData.name: Holy Washer [QFE]
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description: Holy Washer adds the ability for pawns to wash off tainted effect from clothes the "pragmatic" way. No more taint on that apparel! Disclaimer: Requires research and using a wash basin or washing machine. We are not responsible for your colonists profiteering from operating a cannibalist laundromat colony. PACKAGE CONTENTS [Production Building] Wash Basin - allows pawns to wash tainted clothes manually. Requires Basic Washing research. [Production Building] Washing Machine - allows clothes to be washed with electricity at a faster rate. Requires Advanced Washing research. [Research Topics] Basic Washing, Advanced Washing PACKAGE NOTES NOTE: QFE = Quick Fix Engineering, a term borrowed from Microsoft. Meaning that this mod is a quick fix for the original Holy Washer mod by Bunkier, which was not updated for the latest RimWorld versions. Update of Bukier's mod for RimWorld 1.1+ with OkraDonkey's refactoring work. If Bunkier updates the mod, this package will be discontinued. This mod can be downloaded outside of Steam Workshop at https://github.com/daffodilistic/rimworld-mod_HolyWasher AUTHORS Due to the crazy nature of Steam Workshop modding, crediting the authors of this mod are a bit of a mess. The following is the list of people who have contributed to this mod in one way or another: Original C# Code - Blacharnia C# Code - Mlie Additional C# help - erdelf XML Code and Artwork - Bunkier Refactoring - OkraDonkey CN Translation - ccj66629 PL Translation - Bunkier 1.0 Textures - HCSK Team 1.1 compatibility - daffodilistic 1.2 compatibility - daffodilistic 1.3 compatibility - Bunkier 1.4 compatibility - ccharon 1.5 compatibility - Kender 1.6 compatibility - daffodilistic
